theme.title: Hoom+Themez!
theme.friendly_accent: Make ur gadgetz look fancy-schmancy matchy-match mood, today, diz week, or foreberz!
theme.friendly_tiles: Resizez an choos da tilez how u likez on ur hoom screenz!

screen_rotation.title: Spinz Da Screen!
screen_rotation.friendly_rotation_lock: When no spinz iz on, ur hoom stayz how it iz, no matter u turnz ur gadgetz!

reset.title: Reset Groovy Launchy?
reset.message: Dis gon make Groovy all fresh, no customz left :(

root.title: Root Magicz Needz!
root.message: Root iz needed 2 do diz thingy. Pwease gibs rootz!

shizuku.title: Shizuku Permission Needz!
shizuku.message: Gib Shizuku okayz 2 do dis actionz!

update_available.title: New Version Alertz!
update_available.message: Ooh newz vershun ({{version}}), size {{size}}! Wanna getz it?

update_check_failed.title: Updatez Brokeded!
update_check_failed.message: Couldn’t check fur new appy. Tryz 'gain later!

up_to_date.title: Up-to-date Meow!
up_to_date.message: You haz da grooviest Groove Launchy!

font_read_error.title: Font iz Badz!
font_read_error.message: Dis font iz wrongy-wrong! Only .ttf iz okayz. Tryz 'gain!

font_load_error.title: Font Failz!
font_load_error.message: Oopsiez, couldn’t loadz fonty. Only .ttf iz good. Tryz another one!

copy_success.title: Copied, Meow!
copy_success.message: Ur installed appy-list iz now JSON!
